title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V1\ListFunctionsRequest
name: ListFunctionsRequest
description:
Request for the ListFunctions method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v1.ListFunctionsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: The project and location from which the function should be listed, specified in the format projects/*/locations/* If you want to list functions in all locations, use "-" in place of a location. When listing functions in all locations, if one or more location(s) are unreachable, the response will contain functions from all reachable locations along with the names of any unreachable locations.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Maximum number of functions to return per call.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The value returned by the last ListFunctionsResponse; indicates that this is a continuation of a prior ListFunctions call, and that the system should return the next page of data.
